name: INTERNATIONAL TRADE DEFENCE SERVICES BVBA
goal: We are an independent consultancy firm located near the European Institutions dealing with Trade Defence issues including anti-dumping procedures, anti-subsidy procedures and safeguard procedures. We work for European companies who are affected by various trade defence issues.
euInitiatives: We follow all policy developments relating to Trade Defence Instruments as well as the issue of Market Economy Status to China and modernisation
